original_text:
Your hand shall be lifted up over your adversaries,
    and all your enemies shall be cut off.
korean_text: 네 손이 네 대적들 위에 들려서 네 모든 원수를 진멸하기를 바라노라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: Your hand shall be lifted up over your adversaries
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손이 네 대적 위에 들리울 것이며

sentences.original_text: and all your enemies shall be cut off.
